statement.name: INSERT_SMABGM
statement.sql: INSERT INTO SMABGM (NROBGM, CSCBGM, NRORBR, CODBGM, TPOBGM, NVLBGM, TIPBGM, DPNBGM, STDBGM, SQLBKR) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

statement.name: DELETE_SMABGM
statement.sql: Delete from smabgm where tpobgm=? and nrorbr in (Select nrorbr from smarbr where tporbr=?)
